item.description:
You are eligible for membership in Parents Without Partners if you are a parent of one or more children; single due to death, divorce, separation, or never being married; and are of good character. Neither custody nor age of your child or children is a factor in eligibility.

To become a member, you must attend a brief informational meeting, complete the application, supply contact information for a professional reference and pay the annual dues fee of $50 in cash or check.

We offer subsidies to some family events!  In February we are going snow tubing in Amesbury.  The cost is $22 per rider.  The board of directors approved a subsidy of $10 per child, for members who R.S.V.P and attend.   This helps make it a little more affordable for members to do more with their children.
item.how_to_find_us: "From side street, Harlow Court, enter at side door near the back of the church.
item.name: Informational meeting - Parents Without Partners - ALL WELCOME
